snippet.title: Swift: YouTube - How to Create a Slide-In Menu Part 1 (Ep 7)
snippet.description:
Let's look at a very interesting user request today I got from the comments section.  We will look at the settings button on the top right corner of the app that produces a sliding menu from the bottom.  This is a very interesting effect and I'll show you how the various ways to implementing it.

How to create YouTube playlist: 
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0dzCUj1L5JGKdVUtA5xds1zcyzsz7HLj

Completed Source Code: 
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course_video?id=70

Twitter Slide Out Menu Course
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/Twitter-Slide-Out-Menu
